label: 井上馨
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1836-1915). Also: Bunta. Earlier: SHIJI. Choshu hirazamurai (100 koku by birth; 220 koku by adoption). Loyalist. Studied in London, 1863-64. Active in shotai with Takasugi Shinsaku, 1865. Senior posts in Meiji government, becoming finance expert, Genro. Close links with Ito Hirobumi.
